attributes.additional_details: because over the next few months 80-90 % of children are going to be sitting in front of the television most of the day while their parents are desperately trying to get work done.
attributes.background: Create Tv Channels which provide lessons through the day based around the national curriculum. There could be different channels for year 1 , year 2, ETC.

rejection.details: Since you started this petition, the BBC have announced a range of programming to cover the actions you would like to see happen.
